Text:
Loved this show right up until BBC America stopped showing it. Excellent up!! Looking forward to the rest of the episodes.
Thanks.

If you want the other episodes found at http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3554966 to be seeded, you better keep these episodes and seed them. If not, I won't seed the other episodes at all. It's up to you. I'm not going to keep helping out dicks. Also, think about leaving a comment saying thanks.
18 thru 20 is now up. keep seeding what you have... http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3557071
Thanks so much! I thought I'd never get to see the end of this series. Too bad they didn't get ratings, I know I liked it. I am seeding these also. Thanks Again!

http://geekstuff.paulbain.co.uk/uknova-signup-now/

Go there and sign up for UK Nova. That's the tracker that has all the new shipwrecked episodes for the fifth season. New episodes are uploaded every sunday night.
